title: Tough Questions + Trending or Ending, Excellence Fatigue - Fantasy Football Podcast for 3/31
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason answer a number of listener questions! Dynasty trades, keeper decisions, redraft outlooks and more! Plus, will Alvin Kamara return to being a TD machine? Follow now for fantasy content all offseason! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for March 31st, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(05:10) - Quick Question: Alvin Kamara TDs
(12:40) - NFL News
(26:05) - Mailbag
(26:50) - AFC West Champion
(31:00) - Michael Pittman or Terry McLaurin
(33:25) - When to draft Deebo Samuel
(36:45) - Dalvin Cook / Darnell Mooney Dynasty Trade
(38:15) - No Jason Goodbye
(39:30) - JuJu Smith-Schuster or Calvin Ridley
(41:55) - Allen Robinson or Amari Cooper

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
